title: Coinbase CLO Paul Grewal: SEC’s Interpretation of ‘Investment Contract’ Violates Law
description: Paul Grewal, CLO of Coinbase, one of the largest U.S.-based cryptocurrency exchanges, has accused the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) of violating the law by assessing what constitutes an investment contract. Grewal’s reasoning comes from the Supreme Court of the United States’ (SCOTUS) decision thwarting President Biden’s student loan forgiveness program using the so-called […]

title: Shytoshi Kusama unveils release dates for Shibarium and Worldpaper
description: Toronto, Canada, is set to host a series of events from August 13-17, 2023, with the Blockchain Futurist Conference taking centre stage. Adding to the excitement, the renowned Shiba Inu ecosystem will serve as the title sponsor for these events, marking a significant milestone for the project. In an unprecedented move, the leading developer behind ... Read more

title: BREAKING: Shiba Inu’s Shytoshi Kusama Confirms Official Launch Date for Shibarium – Can SHIB Erase More Zeros? Report
description: Shytoshi Kusama, the lead developer of Shiba Inu, unveils the official launch date for Shibarium at the Blockchain Futurist Conference. The conference will showcase the completed Worldpaper, Shib-branded projects, and reveal detailed information about the Treat token. Definitive Date for Shibarium: Unveiling the Launch at Blockchain Futurist Conference The long-awaited mainnet launch of Shibarium, Shiba [...]

title: 5 Incredible Things That Governments Can Ban With CBDCs
description:
As countries around the world consider implementing CBDCs, it is critical to assess the possible regulatory powers they may have. In this article, we examine five things that governments could ban or control more effectively using CBDCs. Raising important questions about individual liberties, privacy, and the evolving role of governments in financial transactions. 1) Cash […]

title: Digitalizing Gold’: BlackRock CEO Pitches Bitcoin to Investors
description:
There’s a growing institutional interest in crypto and the star of the show is Bitcoin. In a recent interview, BlackRock’s CEO labeled the leading cryptocurrency as an “international asset.” Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao addressed BlackRock’s recent entry into the market, adding that it will boost Bitcoin. title: LTC’s Bullish Trend Could Continue Despite Its Latest Price Dip
description:
Throughout the past 24 hours of trading, the majority of the top 10 cryptocurrencies saw their prices drop, and Litecoin (LTC) was no exception to this. At press time, CoinMarketCap indicated that LTC was trading hands at $104.63 after a slight 0.15% price decrease. Despite the 24-hour loss, technicals suggest LTC remains in a bullish […]
